title: What is this ddos
body:
Game was going alright, we a bit behind but we just won a fight and I killed their carries as Caitlyn, but just then, my ping skyrockets to 1000 for the next 10 minutes, my friendly when's goes up to 1300 and Ali dc's whilst we were taking dragon, and he was playing naturally with his abilities just prior so I know it wasn't him quitting by will, he even tried to reconnect but he instantly got disconnected again

Last two members of team had high pings too for the last two mins, around 600, but not as bad as ours

What are the chances of all of us experiencing this at the same time whilst enemy team was fine? We lost due to mere stupidity here

replies.body: ive been drophacked many times almost every time we are winning a close game then boom d/c, reconnect, loss yay fml
regardless of elo if the entire team starts lagging like crazy than something must be up
It's sad that people resort to ddos'ing in silver 5.
I had this earlier, spiked to 4k ping for a solid 10 minutes in a ranked game, was fuckin annoying. i dont know if it was just my internet or not but yeah.
